content:
- hosts: all
  become: yes
  tasks:
    - name: Download agent file
      block:
        - name: create download directory
          file:
            path: "/tmp/install"
            state: directory
          
        - name: Download the agent package
          get_url:
            url: https://stb-se-dev.s3.amazonaws.com/ansible/sb-7.4.0.0-linux-3.10-x86_64.tar.Z
            dest: /tmp/install
            mode: '0440'

        - name: Get download package stat
          stat:
            path: '/tmp/install/sb-7.4.0.0-linux-3.10-x86_64.tar.Z'
          register: st

        - name: Ensure download package exists
          assert:
            that:
              - st.stat.exists
            fail_msg: >-
              Download package is missing.

        - name: Unarchive installer - using zcat and tar utility
          shell: zcat /tmp/install/sb-7.4.0.0-linux-3.10-x86_64.tar.Z | tar xvf -
          args:
            chdir: "/tmp/install/"

        - name: Install system mode agent 
          command: >
            ./unvinst
            --oms_servers 7878@atlanta.stonebranchdev.cloud
            --oms_autostart no
            --python no
            --ac_netname AWS${customer_label}
            --ubroker_start no
          args:
            chdir: '/tmp/install/'

        - name: Start UBrokerd Service
          command: >
            /opt/universal/ubroker/ubrokerd restart
            -uag_transient yes
            -uag_agent_clusters 'DemoCluster1'
          environment:
            UAGTRANSIENT: 'yes'
